Bassman
Your picks for the week of 10/23/05
Bassman

Hey Gang, let's get with the program, here.
 
 Buffalo at Oakland. Don't know much about the Raiders this year, but I'm going to give it to them. Primarily because of Buffalo's shaky run defence.
Heads_On_Pikes

OK. It looks like the Baltimore Ravens are next in line to be severely punished by DAAA BEARZZZ.
 
 BEARZZZ running back Thomas Jones's knee is still a little banged up this week but, like a real man, he took a pre-game pain shot and played last week. Rumor has it that rookie RB Benson is not the sharpest tool in the shed and is having a hard time with the playbook. Luckily, I have e-mailed a plan to coach Lovie Dovie for young Benson. Kyle Orton is to handoff the ball normally to Cedric Benson, then scream at the top of his lungs "STOP!! POLICE!!" That should help motivate Mr. -first round draftpick- Benson to run like his million dollar contract depended on it.
 
 Oh, and thank the lord rookie QB Orton finally figured out that it is within the rules of the game for him to throw the football to the tightend! I'll bet he was wondering why in the hell one of his blockers kept running downfield on pass plays.
 
 
 Another quick observation on the upcoming game;
 
 The Ravens linebacker Ray Lewis is a common street thug and probably carries a loaded handgun in the waistband of his football pants -- I clued Lovie in on this as well in my e-mail. Eurlacher is a FAR better linebacker overall.
 
 Anyhoo, my prediction this week is DAA BEARZZZ 52 -- ravens -10.
 
 If DAA former COACH, DIKKAA is forced into battle becuase all the BEARZZZ players get injured --
 
 BEARZZZ 134 -- ravens 3.
billsco
The Vikings at home, by some fluke, win against Green Bay. All next week we're going to hear from head coach Mike Tice that we're back in the running, and we're a force to be reckoned with.
Heads_On_Pikes

The Packers always play like XXXX in the Dome and the Vikings have something(s) to prove. I hope they beat the cheeseheads like a drum. Every week the Packers lose is a good week for a Bears fan. 
 
 emoticon_xkill Green Bay Packers.
Bassman
"Beat the cheeseheads like a drum." That's funny. BTW, is Buffalo due to play Chicago this year?
Heads_On_Pikes

Naw, the Bills and Bears do not play a regular season game this year.
 
 They played a pre-season game in late August and the Bears won 16 - 12.
billsco

Okay, if you're gonna run with the big dogs, Mike Tice says, you gotta win.
 
 A ray of hope is shining here on these bleak autumn days in Minnesota.
Heads_On_Pikes

Man o man, I was happy to see the Vikings finally shake off the effects of the 30 fly-in hookers from Atlanta boat party and toast the Pack today. That befuddled look on Brett Farve's face at the end of the game was priceless! He looks like that a lot lately. :p 
 
 Ahem, DA BEARZZZ won a nasty, cold, rainy weather defensive battle against the Ravens and knocked hoodlum wannabe Ray Lewis out of the game. Hoodlums sure are sissy's nowadays. "OWieee, my leeeeg hurts!"
Bassman
True to form the Bills got the everlovin' snot knocked out of them because of a nonexistent O-line and a linguini-spined D-line. Go figure?
